datasets.name: 1bb727fb
queryLines:
SELECT
  o_orderdate,
  o_custkey
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`

datasets.name: 3530ec9c
queryLines:
SELECT
    l_shipdate,
    l_suppkey,
    COUNT(*) AS total_orders,
    SUM(CASE WHEN l_returnflag = 'R' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS return_count
FROM
    samples.tpch.lineitem
GROUP BY
    l_shipdate,
    l_suppkey
ORDER BY
    l_shipdate;

datasets.name: 3b52879a
queryLines:
SELECT
  COUNT(distinct(s_suppkey)) AS num_suppliers
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`supplier`

datasets.name: a91573ca
datasets.displayName: Order count by priority and ship mode
queryLines:
SELECT
    o.o_orderpriority AS priority,
    l.l_shipmode AS ship_mode,
    COUNT(*) AS order_count,
    o.o_orderdate
FROM
    samples.tpch.orders AS o
JOIN
    samples.tpch.lineitem AS l
ON
    o.o_orderkey = l.l_orderkey
GROUP BY
    o.o_orderpriority,
    l.l_shipmode,
    o.o_orderdate
ORDER BY
    priority,
    ship_mode;

datasets.name: ced91012
queryLines:
SELECT
    o_orderdate,
    n_name AS nation,
    sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (((length(n_name))/100) + (year(o_orderdate)-1993)/100)) AS revenue
FROM
    `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`,
    `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`,
    `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`,
    `samples`.`tpch`.`nation`
WHERE
    c_custkey = o_custkey
    AND l_orderkey = o_orderkey
    AND c_nationkey = n_nationkey
    AND n_name in ('ARGENTINA', 'UNITED KINGDOM', 'FRANCE', 'BRAZIL', 'CHINA', 'UNITED STATES', 'JAPAN', 'JORDAN')
GROUP BY
    o_orderdate,
    nation
ORDER BY
    nation ASC,
    o_orderdate ASC;

datasets.name: e7a62da2
queryLines:
SELECT
  o_orderdate AS Date,
  o_orderpriority AS Priority,
  sum(o_totalprice) AS `Total Price`
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
WHERE
  o_orderdate > '1994-01-01'
  AND o_orderdate < '1994-01-31'
GROUP BY
  1,
  2
ORDER BY
  1,

datasets.name: ee8e48ce
queryLines:
SELECT revenue_per_customer.customer_id AS `Customer ID #`, customers.c_mktsegment AS `Customer Segment`, concat( '
$', format_number(revenue_per_customer.total_revenue, 0), '
' ) AS `Total Customer Revenue` FROM ( SELECT o_custkey AS customer_id, sum(o_totalprice) AS total_revenue FROM `samples`.`tpch`.`orders` GROUP BY 1 HAVING total_revenue > 0 ) AS revenue_per_customer JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`customer` AS customers ON revenue_per_customer.customer_id = customers.c_custkey JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`region` AS region ON customers.c_nationkey = region.r_regionkey ORDER BY revenue_per_customer.customer_id LIMIT

datasets.name: ea13d9cf
queryLines:
SELECT
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`,
  SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) AS contingent_demand
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`
      ON `orders`.`o_custkey` = `customer`.`c_custkey`
WHERE
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment` IS NOT NULL
  AND `lineitem`.`l_quantity` IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`

datasets.name: 20dab91f
queryLines:
SELECT
  AVG(`part`.`p_retailprice`) AS average_retail_price
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`part`

datasets.name: 9e16b81d
queryLines:
SELECT
  `part`.`p_name`,
  SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) AS total_demand,
  SUM(`partsupp`.`ps_availqty`) AS total_supply
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`partsupp`
      ON `part`.`p_partkey` = `partsupp`.`ps_partkey`
WHERE
  YEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) = 1998
  AND `part`.`p_name` IN (
    SELECT
      `part`.`p_name`
    FROM
      `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
    WHERE
      YEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) = 1998
    GROUP BY
      `part`.`p_name`
    ORDER BY
      SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
GROUP BY
  `part`.`p_name`

datasets.name: 2895faf9
queryLines:
SELECT
  `region`.`r_name`,
  SUM(`lineitem`.`l_extendedprice`) AS total_sales
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`
      ON `orders`.`o_custkey` = `customer`.`c_custkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`nation`
      ON `customer`.`c_nationkey` = `nation`.`n_nationkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`region`
      ON `nation`.`n_regionkey` = `region`.`r_regionkey`
WHERE
  `orders`.`o_orderdate` BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS('1998-08-02', -12) AND '1998-08-02'
GROUP BY
  `region`.`r_name`

datasets.name: ef7c4885
queryLines:
SELECT
  `part`.`p_name`,
  try_divide(SUM(`partsupp`.`ps_availqty`), SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`)) AS fill_rate
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`partsupp`
      ON `part`.`p_partkey` = `partsupp`.`ps_partkey`
WHERE
  YEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) = 1998
  AND `part`.`p_name` IN (
    SELECT
      `part`.`p_name`
    FROM
      `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
    WHERE
      YEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) = 1998
    GROUP BY
      `part`.`p_name`
    ORDER BY
      SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) DESC
    LIMIT 10
  )
GROUP BY
  `part`.`p_name`

datasets.name: f8c2fe06
datasets.displayName: total weekly sales volume (in unit cases) for the top brands, broken down by region
queryLines:
SELECT
  WEEKOFYEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) AS week,
  `region`.`r_name`,
  `part`.`p_brand`,
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`,
  SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) AS total_volume_sales
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`
      ON `orders`.`o_custkey` = `customer`.`c_custkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`nation`
      ON `customer`.`c_nationkey` = `nation`.`n_nationkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`region`
      ON `nation`.`n_regionkey` = `region`.`r_regionkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
GROUP BY
  WEEKOFYEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`),
  `region`.`r_name`,
  `part`.`p_brand`,
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`
ORDER BY
  total_volume_sales DESC
LIMIT 10

datasets.name: 5710b668
queryLines:
SELECT
  `part`.`p_name`,
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`,
  SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`) AS total_sales_mix,
  ROUND(AVG(`part`.`p_retailprice`), 2) AS average_price
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`
      ON `orders`.`o_custkey` = `customer`.`c_custkey`
WHERE
  `part`.`p_name` IS NOT NULL
  AND `customer`.`c_mktsegment` IS NOT NULL
  AND `lineitem`.`l_quantity` IS NOT NULL
  AND `part`.`p_retailprice` IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  `part`.`p_name`,
  `customer`.`c_mktsegment`
ORDER BY
  total_sales_mix DESC
LIMIT 10

datasets.name: 43c4818c
queryLines:
SELECT
  week,
  total_revenue,
  LAG(total_revenue, 1) OVER (ORDER BY week) AS previous_week_revenue,
  try_subtract(total_revenue, LAG(total_revenue, 1) OVER (ORDER BY week)) AS revenue_change,
  try_divide(
    try_subtract(total_revenue, LAG(total_revenue, 1) OVER (ORDER BY week)),
    LAG(total_revenue, 1) OVER (ORDER BY week)
  )
  * 100 AS percentage_change
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      WEEKOFYEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) AS week,
      SUM(`lineitem`.`l_extendedprice`) AS total_revenue
    FROM
      `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
    GROUP BY
      WEEKOFYEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`)
    ORDER BY
      week

datasets.name: c33aa0de
queryLines:
SELECT
  try_divide(
    SUM(
      CASE
        WHEN `lineitem`.`l_shipdate` <= `lineitem`.`l_commitdate` THEN 1
        ELSE 0
      END
    ),
    COUNT(*)
  )
  * 100 AS on_time_delivery_rate_percentage
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`

datasets.name: 669c28eb
queryLines:
SELECT
  AVG(fill_rate) AS average_fill_rate
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      try_divide(SUM(`partsupp`.`ps_availqty`), SUM(`lineitem`.`l_quantity`)) AS fill_rate
    FROM
      `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_orderkey` = `orders`.`o_orderkey`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`part`
          ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `part`.`p_partkey`
        JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`partsupp`
          ON `part`.`p_partkey` = `partsupp`.`ps_partkey`
    WHERE
      YEAR(`orders`.`o_orderdate`) = 1998
  ) AS subquery

datasets.name: 1a87bf42
queryLines:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total_orders,
  SUM(
    CASE
      WHEN `lineitem`.`l_returnflag` = 'R' THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END
  ) AS total_returns
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
      ON `orders`.`o_orderkey` = `lineitem`.`l_orderkey`

datasets.name: b9fc3cc0
datasets.displayName: Out of Stock Return Orders Count
queryLines:
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total_out_of_stock_orders
FROM
  `samples`.`tpch`.`orders`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`lineitem`
      ON `orders`.`o_orderkey` = `lineitem`.`l_orderkey`
    JOIN `samples`.`tpch`.`partsupp`
      ON `lineitem`.`l_partkey` = `partsupp`.`ps_partkey`
WHERE
  `lineitem`.`l_returnflag` = 'R'
  AND `lineitem`.`l_quantity` > `partsupp`.`ps_availqty`

datasets.name: 5b7cd168
queryLines:
SELECT 
  `c_mktsegment`, 
  AVG(`c_acctbal`) AS avg_acctbal
FROM 
  `samples`.`tpch`.`customer`
GROUP BY 
  `c_mktsegment`
ORDER BY 
  `c_mktsegment`;

frame.title: Total Sales Volume by Market segement by each Region
